title: CTF: Terminal Safety
description: The command line is powerful, and with great power comes great responsibility. Prove you understand this power to proceed further in the simulation.

validation_fields.name: one
validation_fields.label: It is safe to copy and paste code or commands you find on the Internet into your command line interface, even if you don't know and trust the source they came from. True or false?

validation_fields.name: two
validation_fields.label: The command line app can move or delete files and folders with no 'do-over', so you should be careful when giving commands that concern files and folders. True or false?
